tokens.resolved_gloss: to work (in any sense); by implication, to serve, till, (causatively) enslave, etc.

tokens.resolved_gloss: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not

tokens.resolved_gloss: to stop (usually over night); by implication, to stay permanently; hence (in a bad sense) to be obstinate (especially in words, to complain)
